|comment #: Secure boot is enabled for bootloader image. EFUSE_RD_ABS_DONE_0
Flash encrypt. Disable UART bootloader encryption. EFUSE_DISABLE_DL_ENCRYPT.
Flash encrypt. Disable UART bootloader decryption. EFUSE_DISABLE_DL_DECRYPT.
Flash encrypt. Disable UART bootloader MMU cache. EFUSE_DISABLE_DL_CACHE.
Flash encrypt. Disable ROM BASIC interpreter fallback. EFUSE_RD_CONSOLE_DEBUG_DISABLE.
Flash encrypt. Flash encryption is enabled if this field has an odd number of bits set. EFUSE_FLASH_CRYPT_CNT.
Flash encrypt. Write protection FLASH_CRYPT_CNT. EFUSE_WR_DIS_FLASH_CRYPT_CNT
Flash encrypt. Write protection encryption key. EFUSE_WR_DIS_BLK1
Security boot. Write protection security key. EFUSE_WR_DIS_BLK2
